summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending, widening, altering and establishing of Avalon Way between Thirty-fifth Avenue Southwest and Thirty-sixth Avenue Southwest, all in the City of Seattle; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
